mapper.sql: SELECT A.ORG_CD as orgCd , B.ORG_NM as orgNm , A.BBS_CD as bbsCd , A.BBS_NM as bbsNm , A.BBS_DESC as bbsDesc , A.BBS_TYPE_CD as bbsTypeCd , A.DETL_VIEW_CD as detlViewCd , A.MAIN_IMG_FILE_SN as mainImgFileSn , A.CMNT_USE_YN as cmntUseYn , A.ANSR_USE_YN as ansrUseYn , A.WRITE_USE_YN as writeUseYn , A.ATCH_USE_YN as atchUseYn , A.EDITOR_USE_YN as editorUseYn , A.MOBILE_USE_YN as mobileUseYn , A.DFLT_YN as dfltYn , A.USE_YN as useYn , A.LIST_VIEW_CNT as listViewCnt , A.MENU_CD as menuCd , A.REG_NO as regNo , A.LOCK_USE_YN as lockUseYn , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regNm , A.REG_DTTM as regDttm , A.MOD_NO as modNo , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) FROM DUAL) AS modNm , A.MOD_DTTM as modDttm , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD AND BBS_CD = A.BBS_CD ) AS atclCnt , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_brd_bbs_atcl WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD AND BBS_CD = A.BBS_CD AND ( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') - DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')) <= 1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isNewAtcl FROM tb_brd_bbs_info A, tb_org_org_info B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 게시판 정보의 전체 목록 */
ORDER BY A.ORG_CD, A.BBS_CD

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 게시판 정보의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY ORGCD, BBSCD
/* SQL ID : select 설 명 : 게시판 정보의 키 생성 */ SELECT CONCAT('BR',LPAD(nextval('SQ_BRD_BBS_INFO'),8,'0'))

/* SQL ID : listPageingForMenu 설 명 : 게시판 정보의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY ORGCD, BBSCD
